mapper.insert: insert into article (id, title, content, event_occurred_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventOccurredTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, title, content, event_occurred_time from article where event_occurred_time >= '' AND event_occurred_time < #{eventOccurredTime}
select id, title, content, event_occurred_time from article where event_occurred_time >= '' AND event_occurred_time < #{eventOccurredTime} limit #{_pagesize} OFFSET #{_skiprows}
mapper.insert:
insert into article
id,
title,
content,
event_occurred_time,
